## Overview

This Privacy Policy explains what personal data we collect, how we use it and
why we may process it.

collection.label: OMITTED
collection.sentence: * Usage Data is a reference to the data automatically collected by either the usage of the service or the infrastructure of the service itself.

our newsletter, or respond to a survey or form, we collect information from
you.
